message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $12000.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13500
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $12500 for the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low, Bob. I can do $14000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $13500 for the product.
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can meet you at $14000, but I need to make a profit. Let's meet in the middle at $14250
